contentList.content: Throw a bubble of acid that damages targets caught in its splash, and leaves behind a 1m diameter acid surface.

Protect yourself against incoming damage, gaining <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="GOON_BLADE_WARD_SPELL">Blade Ward</LSTag> for a duration equal to your <LSTag Tooltip="ProficiencyBonus">Proficiency Bonus</LSTag>. When Blade Ward reduces incoming damage the duration is reduced by 1.
Blade Ward's duration can only be reduced once per turn by any individual entity.
Has <LSTag Tooltip="Resistant">Resistance</LSTag> against[1],[2], and[3] from most sources.
Has <LSTag Tooltip="Resistant">Resistance</LSTag> against[1],[2], and[3] from most sources. When Blade Ward reduces incoming damage the duration is reduced by 1.
Chill Touch

Grasp a target with a spectral hand, preventing them from healing until your next turn.

An Undead target receives Disadvantage on Attack Rolls.
Chill of the Grave
Summon swirling magical lights that illuminate a [1] radius.

Hurl a mote of fire that Burns your target for [1] turn.

If your target is an object, dead, or the ground, create a fire surface in a [1] radius for [2] turns instead.
Launch a mote of infernal flame to set a target alight, causing it to <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="BURNING">Burn</LSTag> for [1] turns.

Subtly influence a non-hostile creature into giving you the benefit of the doubt. Gain <LSTag Tooltip="Advantage">Advantage</LSTag> on <LSTag Tooltip="Charisma">Charisma</LSTag> <LSTag Tooltip="AbilityCheck">Checks</LSTag> against it.

Gain <LSTag Tooltip="Advantage">Advantage</LSTag> on Charisma <LSTag Tooltip="AbilityCheck">Checks</LSTag> against a non-hostile creature in dialogue. When targetting a hostile creature in combat, they must succeed a <LSTag Tooltip="Wisdom">Wisdom</LSTag> <LSTag Tooltip="SavingThrow">Saving Throw</LSTag> or suffer <LSTag Tooltip="Disadvantage">Disadvantage</LSTag> on <LSTag Tooltip="AttackRoll">Attack Rolls</LSTag> against you.
The caster of this charm has <LSTag Tooltip="Advantage">Advantage</LSTag> on <LSTag Tooltip="Charisma">Charisma</LSTag> <LSTag Tooltip="AbilityCheck">Checks</LSTag> against the creature.
Fortify a creature's resolve, granting it a +1d4 bonus to <LSTag Tooltip="AbilityCheck">Ability Checks</LSTag>.
Fortify a creature's resolve, granting it a +1d6 bonus to <LSTag Tooltip="AbilityCheck">Ability Checks</LSTag>.

Project a cone of noxious gas, creating a poison cloud for [1] turns and <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="POISONED">Poisoning</LSTag> creatures that fail a <LSTag Tooltip="Constitution">Constitution</LSTag> <LSTag Tooltip="SavingThrow">Saving Throw</LSTag>.

Conjure a flame in your hand that sheds a light in a [1] radius.

While the flame is alive you can throw it using Produce Flame: Hurl.
The flame can be extinguished at any time using <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Shout_ProduceFlame_Dismiss">Produce Flame: Dismiss</LSTag>.

Hurl the conjured flame in your hand Burning your target for [1], and creating a fire surface in a [1] radius for [2] turns.

If your target is an object, dead, or the ground, create a fire surface in a [3] radius for [2] turns instead.

Fire a beam of frost to hinder your target's mobility, reducing its Movement Speed by [1].

If your target is an object, dead, or the ground, create a frozen surface in a [1] radius for [2] turns instead.
Fortify a creature's resilience, granting it a +1d4 bonus to <LSTag Tooltip="SavingThrow">Saving Throws</LSTag>.
Engulf a target in a flame-like radiance, burning them with <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="BURNING_HOLY">Holy Fire</LSTag> for [1] turn.

Target a creature's equipped weapon, or a staff, club, mace, javelin, dart, spear, or trident directly; it becomes magical and deals[1]. The weapon uses the wielder's <LSTag Tooltip="SpellcastingAbilityModifier">Spellcasting Ability</LSTag> for <LSTag Tooltip="AttackRoll">Attack</LSTag> and damage rolls.
Damage begins at [1], increasing to [2] at level 5, [3] at level 11, and [4] at level 17.

Weapon is magical and deals[5]. Attack Rolls use the wielder's Spellcasting Ability Modifier.

Damage begins at [1], increasing to [2] at level 5, [3] at level 11, and [4] at level 17.
Dismiss Shillelagh
Dispel your equipped weapon's <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="SHILLELAGH">Shillelagh</LSTag> enchantment.

Wreathe your fist in lightning and strike a foe. On a success your target cannot use <LSTag Type="ActionResource" Tooltip="ReactionActionPoint">Reactions</LSTag>, and liquid surfaces it is standing in become electrified. This spell has <LSTag Tooltip="Advantage">Advantage</LSTag> on conductive entities.
Lash out with a thorny vine that grips your target, pulling it [1] closer to you and causing it to <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="BLEEDING">Bleed</LSTag>.

Attempt to predict the actions of other creatures: if your target fails an Intelligence Saving Throw you gain Advantage on your next Attack Roll against them.

Additionally, their Armour Class is reduced equal to your Proficiency Bonus, halved on a successful save (rounded down).
True Strike: Open Defenses
<LSTag Tooltip="ArmourClass">Armour Class</LSTag> is reduced equal to the duration, whenever the creature is attacked the duration is reduced by 1.
Insult your target, causing it to have <LSTag Tooltip="Disadvantage">Disadvantage</LSTag> on its next <LSTag Tooltip="AttackRoll">Attack Roll</LSTag>.
No Offense Taken
You question the impact your words have had upon the object.
You question the impact your words have had upon the corpse.
